title: Controlled Longings
description: Bryan grew up in a strict, religious family. Sex before marriage was frowned upon. But then again, the rest of his family wasn’t a werewolf.Michelle had been with Bryan for fourteen months, yet he hadn’t so much as hugged her plus size frame. Where is the line of respect drawn?When Michelle threatens to walk away, Bryan must decide whether to follow his instincts and claim his mate or to remain true to a religion that isn’t always relative to the supernatural.
author: Christin Lovell
